meanings.definition: A flat-bottomed boat used for transporting goods on rivers and canals.

meanings.sent2: The workers loaded the cargo onto the scows for transport.
meanings.sent3: The scows had a race to see which one could carry the most goods.

meanings.definition: To transport goods on a scow.

meanings.sent2: He scows goods daily to earn a living.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to scow the picnic items to the park.
meanings.sent4: She scows with such precision that nothing ever gets damaged.
meanings.sent5: Scowing heavy items can be tiring but rewarding work.
